General.Name: Harmony Electronics
General.Description: Harmony Electronics Co. Ltd manufactures and sells quartz frequency components in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers quartz crystals, crystal oscillators, microphones, and related electronic parts and products. Its products are used in mobile phones and personal computers, as well as in industrial and automotive fields. Harmony Electronics Co. Ltd was incorporated in 1976 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
